reviewText: Pretty good! Just what i espected!

Like the most recent Resident Evil set this is nothing more than a cardboard sleeve with the individual blu rays in it. No extras, no books in the movies, nothing special at all. Also, the pictures of the box set is wrong, It does also have Scarface in the set and it is listed on the box. Great movies and they look great on blu ray.
These are all good to great gangster movies, and the package is a great deal.  The transfers onto Bluray DVD were all done well and there are no technical problems with the discs.
Best collection, like all the movie  and ship fast.
love it
Love these films.
It's an awesome set of movies.
All good movies for a great price! Perfect quality in each one I've watched!
Great set!
For anyone who is into gangster movies, this is a very good collection outside the "Godfather collection."  I recommend this to anyone.
very good

All 5 movies are mesmerizing, cinematic treats. Even if public enemies isn't all that great compared to the others it doesn't make me regret the purchase of the other 4 gangster epics. Buy this and prepare for nearly 15 hours of violence, intense dialogue, lots of swearing, and many memorable scenes.
because... how could you NOT?!
Exactly as promised.
great movie set but only one of the movies work thats why i rate a 2
Received the wrong format for this order

Good collection of films - nice box to add to our ever growing collection of blu rays.
Picture is amazing!
A great add to my blu Ray collection I love these movies
good
Great Collection...No dull moments.
Ultimate is right!!
Very Very Good Thank You

Overall I'm happy to add these movies to my ever growing collection but they weren't what I expected. There is another customer image that shows a different version of the set which is what I actually wanted to receive and the item picture above has the straight edges on the case so I figured it came with a sleeve but it doesn't. So I'm really just writing this review as a disclaimer that the version of this box set they send you might vary. Also I don't like the single case for all 5 movie's. They designed it in a way that makes it a pain to close and the discs don't always latch on and occasionally come loose which FYI to the designer isn't good for physical media especially when that can lead to scratches.
Great collection of movies at a great price! I highly recommend this set.  I am happy to have added these movies to my collection.
Great collection of movies!
Loved the collection
perfect for my Dad..all of his favorite movies
All movies play great. Only issue the case all 5 come in could be better quality. It would be better if each had its own case.
Great set, arrived on time.
Awesome collection, however the casing for the blu ray disc(s)  arrived broken and the movies are unsecured. I would like a replacement case.
Good product, delivered quickly, good price.
Great films for a excellent deal.
